mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, George Washington to Elizabeth Willing Powel, 1793 February
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
Lear Tobias, 1762-1816
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A short note from George Washington to Elizabeth Willing Powel on her anniversary of fifty. Followed by a 17 stanza poem identified by The Papers of George Washington Digital Edition, ed. Theodore J. Crackel. (Charlottesville: University of Virginia Press, Rotunda, 2008) as a copy by Tobias Lear "from a manuscript dated 1 May 1792, which is in the handwriting of the poet Elizabeth Graeme Fergusson (1737–1801) and which ends with a personal note from the author .... Lear left out two couplets, rearranged the words in some lines, substituted lines of his own, and eliminated most of Fergusson’s punctuation, [yet] the theme of the poem sent to Mrs. Powel is still the same as Fergusson’s original." Autograph letter, 1 page, and accompanying poem (autograph), 4 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Powel, Elizabeth Willing, 1743-1830 -- Anniversary -- Birthday
